About Us

Tech First Foundation is an international non-profit. Organization dedicated to transforming education in low-income and undeserved communities through Information Technology (IT).

In our world, where education, or more specifically, IT education paves the path to success, we stand as the rich uncle, aunty, and friend, opening doors to worlds once unreachable.

The COVID-19 pandemic was a wake-up call, showing us a stark reality. While some continued their education seamlessly, those in low-income areas found themselves at a standstill, with technology being the dividing line.

This crisis, now receding, leaves behind a powerful lesson: Information Technology (IT) is not just a tool, but a necessity in achieving consistent, quality education in our fast-evolving digital landscape.

1

Our Mission

Our Core Mission is to be the safe haven, the beacon of hope for young minds and their families. We are committed to providing uninterrupted access to rich IT education, to empower young minds and families, empowering them to build the lives of their dreams.

2

Our Vision

Our Vision at Tech First Foundation is to be the generous and supportive Rich Uncle, Aunty, and Friend, financing and providing access to unparalleled education, from the digital world to the tangible, for those who Dream Big, even in the face of financial challenges. .

3

Our approach is threefold :

Our Vision at Tech First Foundation is to be the generous and supportive Rich Uncle, Aunty, and Friend, financing and providing access to unparalleled education, from the digital world to the tangible, for those who Dream Big, even in the face of financial challenges. .

1

Providing resources

Providing resources like computers, applications, software, as well as , relevant training to foster innovation among children and teachers in remote communities. .

2

Offering an alternative mode of education

Offering an alternative mode of education by giving our beneficiaries access to online programs, in IT skills, device repair, software design, and more.

3

Aspires to evolve into a talent haven

As we grow and our impact resonates, Tech First Foundation aspires to evolve into a talent haven, a prime source for businesses and institutions locally and globally, seeking fresh, talented minds.

Meet the Team

At TFF, we believe in the power of unity and the impact of shared goals.

We are more than just a team; we are a family. A family that celebrates diversity, values collaboration, and believes deeply in our cause.
